# Balts' Award

The '''Balts' Award''' (, ) is an annual award given to recognise excellence and achievements in the areas of Latvian-Lithuanian culture, history and language.
The award was inaugurated in 2018.
List of recipients
* 2023: Edmundas Trumpa, Lithuanian linguist
* 2022: , Latvian translator
* 2020: , Latvian philologist and diplomat
* 2019: , Lithuanian linguist
* 2018: , Latvian Lithuanian professor and linguist
